name: Hunted: Escape the City
description:
Can you survive in this apocalyptic city?

Hunted: Escape the city is a first person survival horror game where you can collect items, craft weapons and tools and survive against crawlers.

You can... Collect

Resources and materials to aid in survival.

Craft

Weapons, tools and other items needed to protect and sustain yourself.

Survive

Against the hordes of monsters known as "crawlers".

Explore

The expansive forgotten city.

Includes... Original Dynamic Music

Original, orchestrated music that adapts to the player's actions and situation in the game.

Handcrafted Models and Textures

Custom made models and textures for a more tailored experience.

Atmospheric Sounds

Unique sounds made to immerse.

Note: Mac and Linux versions are untested, please provide feedback in case of error.
